page.title: 18Events
page.content: Moreton Carnival is held every year, this year it was held at Lingham School.Its starts at Upton and a big procession works its way down to where it is held.The Carnival Princess was also at the carnival.There was also a stand which would paint your face and dye your hair in different colours,and everyone enjoyed the inflatable.As always the carnival soon ended,but everyone had thoroughly enjoyed it.24 schools were there and six games were being played at once.The games started and our first game was against Ballantyne. Before hand Debbie was going round saying "watch out Ballantyne are very good you know". Then who has to go and score a rounder? Debbie! we beat Ballantyne 1_0,we were off to a good start.We played all our games drew one and won the rest.....
